references.paper_title: Neural operator: Graph kernel network for partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of neural operators, which is directly built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Reformulation of elasticity theory for discontinuities and long-range forces
references.reason: This paper introduces peridynamics, which is a critical theoretical framework for the current work.
This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of the field of physics-informed machine learning, which is the primary area of application for this work.
This paper introduces the attention mechanism, which is a central component of the proposed NAO architecture.

references.paper_title: Interpretable machine learning: Fundamental principles and 10 grand challenges
references.reason: This paper discusses the importance of interpretability in machine learning, which is a key motivation for the current work.
